Name: Final Attack
Desc:
Attack skills have a chance of inflicting additional damage. Must have a Sword and Blunt equipped.
Required Skill: Lv. 3 Weapon Mastery or higher

H.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] 40% chance to activate Final Attack that deals 80% damage 2 times.
H.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks have a 40% chance of attacking at 80% Damage 2 more times.

h1.Old: [Final Attack Typed Skill] 40% chance to activate Final Attack that deals 80% damage 2 times.
h1.New: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks have a 40% chance of attacking at 80% Damage 2 more times.

HFields.h1: [Final Attack Type Skill] Successful attacks have a 40% chance of attacking at 80% Damage 2 more times.
